channel.title: About D - More Info. on VitaminDWiki
channel.description: Recent content in About D - More Info. on VitaminDWiki

item.title: 10 Vitamin D Myths - GrassrootsHealth
item.description:
MYTHS from GrassrootsHealth

Vitamin D is essential for our health. Know what is true and what is not so you can make the most of vitamin D for YOUR health!

Original, in English, has graphics

MYTH #1: VITAMIN D IS STORED IN FAT FOR USE

Vitamin D IS fat soluble, but is not stored as a means of maintaining healthy blood levels, so is needed on a regular basis. In fact, the more fat a person has on their body, the more likely they are to have D deficiency.

item.title: Vitamin D Timeline (generated by AI)
item.description:
Timeline was generated in just 2 minutes using AI by https://www.preceden.com/

Other topics I might have it make timelines for include:

Magnesium Health, Omega-3 health, “vitamin D” “vitamin K”, Diabetes, Pregnancy “vitamin d”

||1913|Discovery Of Vitamin D

1921|Rickets Linked To Vitamin D Deficiency

1936|Chemical Structure Of Vitamin D Determined

1937|Milk Fortified With Vitamin D

1941|Cod Liver Oil As A Source Of Vitamin D

1945|Cod Liver Oil Recommended To Prevent Rickets

1949|Ultraviolet (UV) Light Exposure Linked To Production Of Vitamin D

item.title: Vitamin D studies -graphs of increases as of 2022
item.description:
Increasing # Vitamin D studies over the past 30 years

Peak # of studies published during the year

|| D   5,800 peak %%% | D & Breast Cancer   123 peak %%%

D & Cancer   643 peak %%%| D & Virus   539 peak %%%||


Markdown:
--------

#### Increasing # Vitamin D studies over the past 30 years

 **Peak # of studies published during the year** 

|| **D     <span style="color:orange;">5,800</span> peak** %%%<img src="/attachments/d3.mock.jpg" alt="image" width="400"> |  **D &  Breast Cancer      <span style="color:orange;">123</span> peak** %%%<img src="/attachments/d3.mock.jpg" alt="image" width="400">

 **D & Cancer     <span style="color:orange;">643</span> peak** %%%<img src="/attachments/d3.mock.jpg" alt="image" width="400">|  **D & Virus     <span style="color:orange;">539 </span>peak** %%%<img src="/attachments/d3.mock.jpg" alt="image" width="400">||
